item.description: World History Timeline* *According to Islamic Sources *including creation of the Universe and development of Abrahamic religions according to Islamic sources ☪️. Time to read: {{ .ReadingTime }} {{ .Scratch.Get "readingTime" }} -- DISCLAIMER! Assalamu Aleikum (Peace be upon you), ﷽ This guide is compiled from various sources and there may be minor discrepancies and incorrect details. The main purpose of the guide was to combine an overview of the whole timeline of the world as of we know today according to Islamic sources.
